briefdescription.para: Retrieves and caches node positions and their name/ns.

detaileddescription.para: Supports the .NET serialization infrastructure. Don't use this constructor in your regular application.

parameterdescription.para: The navigator to expose as a reader.
The navigator to expose as a reader.
Specifies that the reader should expose as an XML fragment the current navigator node and all its following siblings.

briefdescription.para: Reads the current node and all its siblings, and returns the XML for them as a fragment.
Provides an XmlReader over an XPathNavigator.

detaileddescription.para: Reader is positioned at the current navigator position. Reading it completely is similar to querying for the XmlNode.OuterXml property. An additional option is to specify that the reader should expose an XML fragment with the current navigator and all its following siblings. This is done at construction time.
The navigator is cloned at construction time to avoid side-effects in calling code.
